name: tia ~ baby doll's dress
sizes_available: one size, to fit a 14" doll
notes:
this is a very quick to knit little dress 

perfect for a 36cm (14") baby doll 

knitted from the top down, worked flat and a short seam at the back, but if you are comfortable knitting in the round - the lower half can be knitted this way.

requirements:
dk yarn ~ around 28g - 30g of acrylic dk
4mm needles
a small button

 
tension / gauge:
22sts = 4” (10cm)

add a ribbon bow if desired. 


**to get this free pattern please click on the https link just below
↓**
